reviews.text: Our room here was so comfortable and nice, the terrace was so inviting, a private sunny refuge with a lime tree growing on it. The show stopper is the view from the small restaurant. It;s a spectacular view of all the yachts parked near Monaco. The staff treated us great, and the breakfast was wonderful. although way too much food.  We did not get a chance to eat dinner at the hotel, but would expect it to be just as good. This is not a hotel you should stay at if you have mobility issues. It was two sets of steep (one twisting) stairs, then another two sets outside, just to get to our room. I can't imagine it work for people with small children or mobility issues.

Charming little hotel with amazing views, spotless and comfortable rooms and a very friendly service. Only a short bus ride from Monaco so a much better option than staying in the crowded Monte Carlo. Highly recommended!

Lovely place which is newly renovated. Staff is super friendly and helpful. 5 min walk to the beach and 15 min walk to Monaco.

Only downside is that they charge for parking (a car is a must in this area) and food is pricey.
Friendly staff, beautiful room and welcome drink and breakfast at the room made the visit extra special. Highly recommended!

Wonderful boutique Hotel. Staff was absolutely amazing. Location and views are killer and the hotel was very quiet . Rooms are romantic and beds are comfortable which is not always the case in France. The walk to the beach is about 6 minutes. Again, wonderful hotel only 7 rooms which is nice.
